item.description:
I promise that most of the activities off this site will be outdoor sports related but a pub crawl is a great way to get to know your fellow Meetup people.

We will co-run this event with another Meetup, I will be a pretty big event with at least 50 people. This will also be Head of the Charles Regetta weekend so I expect some big crowds in Harvard Square. Try to take public transportation if possible.

Here is the bar list for October 18, 2008

Davis Sq.
1. Redbones / Underbones - 1:15 - 2:00
2. Burren 2:00 - 2:45
3. Sligo Pub 2:45 - 3:30
4. Joshua Tree 3:30 - 4:15
T- Ride to Harvard (Gives people a break) - Buy a prepaid Charlie Card for the T!
Harvard Square
5. Hong Kong 4:30 - 5:15
6. Plough and Stars 5:15 - 6:00
7. People's Republik 6:15 - 7:00
Central Square
8. Tavern in the Square 7:15 - 8:00

Pub Crawl shirts are on sale for $20. When you RSVP - indicate your shirt size. It will be a long sleeve shirt!

group.name: Boston Ski, Snowboard, and Outdoor Adventurers Meetup Group

item.name: Pub Crawl Davis Sq to Central Sq
